Milpitas.Alum Rock station: Alum Rock BART station is a proposed underground Bay Area Rapid Transit station in eastern San Jose, California, located near Highway 101 and Santa Clara Street.. Preceded by the Berryessa BART station, it would be the first station of the Phase II portion of the Silicon Valley BART extension. The station would have direct service to Santa Clara, Richmond, and San Francisco/Daly City.
